alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued November 28 at 9:29PM CST until December 01 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST TUESDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...In Alabama, Mobile Coastal and Baldwin Coastal Counties. In Florida, Escambia Coastal, Santa Rosa Coastal and Okaloosa Coastal Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM CST Tuesday through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While rip currents may be moderate to start the day Tuesday morning, they will rapidly increase to a high risk late Tuesday morning with strong onshore winds, increasing swell, and increasing seas.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
